Articles.Content:
When moving a tourist from a transport to a docked lander the kerb cloned.  I have Patsby in the transport and another Patsby in the lander.   I landed lander-Patsby on Minmus as per contract now the lander is back docked with the transport.  The contract shows the landing as being complete but I have questions. 

Should I roll  dice for double rewards by taking transport-Patsby down for a surface visit also? 

Should I avoid allowing the 2 of them meet in the same compartment  to prevent a philosophical conundrum kraken?

Do I need to figure out which one is real and which is the Kylon infiltrator?

More seriously, should I try to fix the game file or just take them both back to Kerbin (I have a spare seat as per norm for last minute rescue contracts) and let the Mission Control sort it out?
Take them back home and let someone else deal with the ramifications.
This just sounds like someone has to do a bunch of paperwork.  And that sounds like actual work.
I ended up deleting the "crew = Patsby Kerman" line for transport-Patsby from the save file and happy ending ensued.  I didn't want the contract completion to get confuzzzed
